dt: {bc}to treat, taint, or impregnate with or as if with poison
{bc}to inhibit the activity, course, or occurrence of

dt.t: on the night when he {wi}poisoned{/wi} my rest

shortdef: to injure or kill with poison
to treat, taint, or impregnate with or as if with poison
to exert a baneful influence on : corrupt

dt: {bc}an acute gastrointestinal disorder caused by bacteria or their toxic products or by chemical residues in food

shortdef: an acute gastrointestinal disorder caused by bacteria or their toxic products or by chemical residues in food

dt: {bc}chronic intoxication that is produced by the absorption of lead into the system and is characterized especially by fatigue, abdominal pain, nausea, diarrhea, loss of appetite, anemia, a dark line along the gums, and muscular paralysis or weakness of limbs

shortdef: chronic intoxication that is produced by the absorption of lead into the system and is characterized especially by fatigue, abdominal pain, nausea, diarrhea, loss of appetite, anemia, a dark line along the gums, and muscular paralysis or weakness of limbs —called also saturnism

dt: {bc}food poisoning caused by bacteria or bacterial products

shortdef: food poisoning caused by bacteria or bacterial products
